sessions.title: Morning Yoga Flow
sessions.description: Start your day with this energizing yoga flow that combines strength, flexibility, and mindfulness. Perfect for beginners and intermediate practitioners. This flowing sequence will awaken your body and prepare you for the day ahead.

sessions.title: Meditation for Beginners
sessions.description: Learn the basics of mindfulness meditation with guided instruction. This session will teach you breathing techniques, posture, and how to quiet your mind. Ideal for those new to meditation.

sessions.title: Power Yoga
sessions.description: Intense yoga practice designed to build strength, endurance, and flexibility. This dynamic session combines traditional yoga poses with vigorous movements for a full-body workout.

sessions.title: Deep Relaxation
sessions.description: Guided meditation for deep relaxation and stress relief. Use progressive muscle relaxation and visualization techniques to release tension and achieve a state of deep calm.

sessions.title: HIIT Workout
sessions.description: High-intensity interval training session for maximum calorie burn and fitness gains. Short bursts of intense exercise followed by brief recovery periods. Get results in minimal time.

sessions.title: Swedish Massage Techniques
sessions.description: Learn professional Swedish massage techniques for relaxation and muscle tension relief. Covers effleurage, petrissage, and other classic massage strokes.

sessions.title: Vinyasa Flow
sessions.description: Dynamic flowing yoga sequence that synchronizes breath with movement. Build heat, increase flexibility, and find your flow in this intermediate-level practice.

sessions.title: Mindful Walking
sessions.description: Combine meditation with gentle movement in this mindful walking practice. Learn to be present and aware while moving, connecting mind and body.

sessions.title: Core Strength Training
sessions.description: Target your core muscles with this focused strength training session. Build a strong foundation for better posture, balance, and overall fitness.

sessions.title: Restorative Yoga
sessions.description: Gentle, relaxing yoga practice focused on restoration and healing. Hold poses for extended periods using props for support. Perfect for stress relief and recovery.

sessions.title: Breath Work Fundamentals
sessions.description: Master essential breathing techniques for stress reduction and energy enhancement. Learn pranayama practices that you can use anywhere, anytime.

sessions.title: Full Body Stretch
sessions.description: Comprehensive stretching routine targeting all major muscle groups. Improve flexibility, reduce muscle tension, and prevent injury with this daily stretch sequence.

sessions.title: Yin Yoga
sessions.description: Slow-paced yoga practice with poses held for longer periods. Target deep connective tissues and promote flexibility while cultivating mindfulness.

sessions.title: Sleep Meditation
sessions.description: Guided meditation designed to help you fall asleep peacefully. Uses body scan, visualization, and relaxation techniques to quiet the mind and prepare for rest.

sessions.title: Cardio Blast
sessions.description: Heart-pumping cardio workout to boost metabolism and improve cardiovascular health. No equipment needed - just your body and determination.
